title: Wtb: T206s in high grade- psa, sgc, bvg, gai

posts.post_title: Wtb: T206s in high grade- psa, sgc, bvg, gai
posts.post_content: Will also buy psa high grades with qualifiers. Thanks

Have a few SGC 84s that I could part with for $450 each:

Downey batting (piedmont)
Livingstone (piedmont)
Street catching (sweet caporal 350-460 fact 42 overprint)

E-mail me please if interested in scans.
Thanks,
--S
Shaun- my bad, i had you mixed up one someone else. sorry about that

I wasn't ignoring your e-mails.  I simply was at work from 6am till 9pm today.  That's the only reason I didn't respond yet to the 6 messages that you sent to me in the course of one single day.  Please check your e-mail for my response.

Thanks,
--S
